description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take up arms and shoot the targets! ShootOut is a 3D FPS, where players shoot their way through firing ranges in attempts to get a new high score, best time, or better accuracy. Featuring over 15 levels spanning various locations, 6 guns to master, weapon challenges, secret items to find, tons of medals to earn and unlock, and a great soundtrack makes ShootOut a must have for all FPS players.
description.short: Take up arms and shoot the targets! ShootOut is a 3D FPS, where players shoot their way through firing ranges in attempts to get a new high score, best time, or better accuracy.
